snippet: H Partners Management, which owns 14.5 percent of the Sealy Corporation, is pushing to remake the mattress maker's board, taking aim at a single shareholder, Kohlberg Kravis Roberts.
abstract: H Partners Management, which owns 14.5 percent of the Sealy Corporation, is pushing to remake the mattress maker's board, taking aim at a single shareholder, Kohlberg Kravis Roberts.

headline.main: Sealy Investor Calls for Board Shake-Up
